title: Chamonix
name: Le Tour
directions: at the far end of the valley, towards Martigny
content: It has many easier slopes for beginners, but also some out-of-bounds skiing if you are willing to hike up with your skis.  The front side of Le Tour is also a good place to go if you don't like being cold, because most slopes are in the sun (although it can still be very windy, especially on the back side down towards Vallorcine).
